short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple moderation utility for Codychat-powered Chatrooms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mod Utils is a simple extension that adds one-click action buttons to Codychat-powered websites, such as Chat Avenue or 321 Chat. 

The first button is a red lightning bolt, which upon clicking opens the kick dialog with the contents of the user's message pre-pasted into the kick reason, allowing mods to kick in 2 button presses. 

The second button is an hourglass, which opens the user's history, allowing mods to quickly see who they're dealing with, even in a room that moves fast.

More buttons will be added in the future once the interface is more refined.
